content.content: First of all: I really love the new voting portal, it is so much faster than the old one and it is great that i can bundle all polls in a single tx  I like it too that voters can now add a comment when voting for an executive, but I think we would have a lot more information if we would also offer a way of adding a comment to a poll so we can find out why voters e.g. vote against a poll. Wouldn’t it be interesting to understand why holders vote against UNI-V2-DAI-ETH or AAVE?
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is providing feedback on a new voting portal and suggesting a feature to add comments to polls to understand why voters vote against a poll. The post also asks a question about the feasibility of adding this feature.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback

content.content: This topic was automatically closed 91 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
